Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago
ShortDescription: Northbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt and Chestnut: near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt, Chestnut and over regular route: due to police activity near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
